skill.name: angular-migration
skill.description: Migrate from AngularJS to Angular using hybrid mode, incremental component rewriting, and dependency injection updates. Use when upgrading AngularJS applications, planning framework migrations, or modernizing legacy Angular code.
skill.summary: Migrate from AngularJS to Angular using hybrid mode, incremental component rewriting, and dependency...

security_audit.summary: No code execution or data access patterns are present. The content is documentation and example snippets only. No network or file system operations exist.

content.user_title: Plan an AngularJS to Angular migration
content.value_statement: Legacy AngularJS code blocks modern features and maintenance. This skill provides a clear, incremental migration path with hybrid patterns and best practices.
actual_capabilities: Explain big bang, incremental, and vertical slice strategies
Provide hybrid app bootstrap patterns with UpgradeModule
Show controller, directive, and service conversions
Detail DI upgrade and downgrade patterns
Outline routing and forms migration examples
limitations: Does not run code analysis or modify source files
Does not generate project-specific migration scripts
Does not validate build or test results
Does not replace official Angular CLI guidance

use_cases.title: Migration roadmap
use_cases.description: Create a phased plan and decide between hybrid or full rewrite.

use_cases.title: Component conversion guide
use_cases.description: Convert controllers and directives into Angular components.

use_cases.title: Effort estimation
use_cases.description: Draft a realistic timeline with phases and milestones.

prompt_templates.title: Migration overview
prompt_templates.prompt: Give a simple migration plan for a small AngularJS app, including strategy choice and key risks.

prompt_templates.title: Hybrid bootstrap
prompt_templates.prompt: Provide steps to set up a hybrid AngularJS and Angular app with ngUpgrade and manual bootstrap.

prompt_templates.title: Directive to component
prompt_templates.prompt: Explain how to convert an AngularJS directive with isolated scope to an Angular component with inputs and outputs.

prompt_templates.title: Full migration plan
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a phased migration plan with vertical slices, DI changes, routing migration, and testing guidance.

output_examples.input: I need a phased plan to migrate a medium AngularJS app with minimal downtime.
output: Choose a hybrid strategy with ngUpgrade
Start by migrating shared services and utilities
Convert routing to Angular Router in parallel
Migrate one feature at a time with tests
Remove AngularJS and ngUpgrade during cleanup

best_practices: Start with services to reduce UI churn
Adopt TypeScript and Angular style guide early
anti_patterns: Mixing AngularJS and Angular patterns in one component

faq.question: Is this compatible with all AngularJS versions?
faq.answer: It targets AngularJS 1.x and Angular 2+ migration patterns.

faq.question: What are the main limits of this skill?
faq.answer: It provides guidance and examples, not automated code changes.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with my existing build tools?
faq.answer: Yes, use it alongside your current CLI and build pipeline.

faq.question: Does it access my source code or data?
faq.answer: No, it only provides guidance and examples.

faq.question: What if my hybrid app fails to bootstrap?
faq.answer: Check UpgradeModule setup, manual bootstrap order, and strictDi settings.

faq.question: How does this compare to a full rewrite?
faq.answer: It emphasizes incremental migration to reduce risk and downtime.
